description: ff. 271. 270 x 195; 195 x 133 mm. 25 lin. 15th cen. Commentary on Ibn al-Sāʻatī's Badīʻ al-niẓām, completed in Rabīʻ II, 729. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الرحىم الرحمن الکرىم المنان الذى نزل القران وخلق الانسان
author: Tabrīzī, ḥasan ibn Sharaf, d. 1368
title: Sharḥ al-Badīʻ.
creator: Tabrīzī, ḥasan ibn Sharaf, d. 1368
subject: Ibn al-Sāʻātī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1254-1294 or 5.—Badīʻ al-niẓām al-jāmiʻ bayna Kitāb al-Bazdawī wa-al-Aḥkām.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
